original_text: He said to them, “Because of your hardness of heart Moses allowed you to divorce your wives, but from the beginning it was not so.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 모세가 너희 마음의 완악함 때문에 아내 버림을 허락하였거니와 본래는 그렇지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Because of your hardness of heart
Moses allowed you to divorce your wives,
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 너희에게 아내를 내어버리는 것을 허락했으나

sentences.original_text: but from the beginning it was not so.
